text: Original paper: Fly Cell Atlas: single-nucleus transcriptomic atlas adult fruit fly, Li et al. (2022). Detailed supplementary material. Two web platforms used automate processing, visualisation downstream analyses Drosophila samples: [SCope]((https://flycellatlas.org/scope) [ASAP]((https://flycellatlas.org/asap) nextflow GitHub repository process 10X Genomic samples.
